description: Parseur is a document/email parsing tool that extracts structured data from emails, attachments, PDFs, invoices, forms, etc. It supports dynamic templates and table fields, and delivers parsed output to integrations (e.g. via webhook or API). This integration enables reactive workflows based on new processed documents, failed processing, mailbox changes, and more.

actions.name: createDocumentFromFile
actions.description: Creates new document in mailbox from file.

actions.name: findDocument
actions.description: Finds a document based on search param.

actions.name: getParsedDocumentById
actions.description: Fetch parsed JSON / structured output for a given document ID

actions.name: reprocessDocument
actions.description: Send an existing document back through parsing (e.g. after updating template).

triggers.name: newDocumentExportFailed
triggers.description: Fires when an automated export endpoint (webhook / integration) fails for a processed document.

triggers.name: newDocumentNotProcessed
triggers.description: Fires when Parseur fails to parse a document (e.g. no matching template).

triggers.name: newDocumentProcessed
triggers.description: Fires when a new document is successfully processed and parsed by Parseur.

triggers.name: newMailbox
triggers.description: Fires when a new mailbox is created in the Parseur account.

triggers.name: newTableFieldProcessed
triggers.description: Fires when a document with table fields is processed, and triggers for each row (table field) separately.
